languages.text: Ужас заполнил сознание Лорд-капитана, а вместе с {mf|ним|ней} — и всего отряда. Не умея совладать с ним, люди устремились в бегство, преследуемые эхом знакомого голоса. Отступление прервалось только вблизи челнока, где страшное, монотонное "Мы продолжаем движение" более не было слышно.

traits.locale_text: Ужас заполнил сознание Лорд-капитана, а вместе с {mf|ним|ней} — и всего отряда. Не умея совладать с ним, люди устремились в бегство, преследуемые эхом знакомого голоса. Отступление прервалось только вблизи челнока, где страшное, монотонное "Мы продолжаем движение" более не было слышно.

languages.text: Terror flooded the Lord Captain's mind, and the rest of the unit fell victim as well. Unable to master their fear, the team fled, pursued by the echo of that familiar voice. The hasty retreat only stopped when they approached the shuttle, where the unsettling, monotonous words, "Proceeding to the bridge," could no longer be heard.
languages.original_text: Ужас заполнил сознание Лорд-капитана, а вместе с {mf|ним|ней} — и всего отряда. Не умея совладать с ним, люди устремились в бегство, преследуемые эхом знакомого голоса. Отступление прервалось только вблизи челнока, где страшное, монотонное "Мы продолжаем движение" более не было слышно.

traits.locale_text: Terror flooded the Lord Captain's mind, and the rest of the unit fell victim as well. Unable to master their fear, the team fled, pursued by the echo of that familiar voice. The hasty retreat only stopped when they approached the shuttle, where the unsettling, monotonous words, "Proceeding to the bridge," could no longer be heard.

The hasty retreat only stopped when they approached the shuttle, where the unsettling, monotonous words, "Proceeding to the bridge," could no longer be heard.

Terror flooded the Lord Captain's mind, and the rest of the unit fell victim as well. Unable to master their fear, the team fled, pursued by the echo of that familiar voice. The hasty retreat only stopped when they approached the shuttle, where the unsettling, monotonous words, "Proceeding to the bridge," could no longer be heard.

Terror flooded the Lord Captain's mind, and the rest of the unit fell victim as well. Unable to master their fear, the team fled, pursued by the echo of that familiar voice. The hasty retreat only stopped when they approached the shuttle, where the unsettling, monotonous words, "Proceeding to the bridge," could no longer be heard.

languages.text: El terror inundó la mente de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} y el resto de la unidad también sucumbió. Incapaces de hacer frente al miedo, los integrantes del equipo huyeron perseguidos por el eco de esa voz conocida. La retirada solo terminó al acercarse a la lanzadera, donde ya no se escuchaba el monótono mensaje de «Se dirige al puente».
languages.original_text: Terror flooded the Lord Captain's mind, and the rest of the unit fell victim as well. Unable to master their fear, the team fled, pursued by the echo of that familiar voice. The hasty retreat only stopped when they approached the shuttle, where the unsettling, monotonous words, "Proceeding to the bridge," could no longer be heard.

traits.locale_text: El terror inundó la mente de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} y el resto de la unidad también sucumbió. Incapaces de hacer frente al miedo, los integrantes del equipo huyeron perseguidos por el eco de esa voz conocida. La retirada solo terminó al acercarse a la lanzadera, donde ya no se escuchaba el monótono mensaje de «Se dirige al puente».

languages.text: 舰长大人的脑中充满了恐惧，其他人也成为了恐惧的猎物。在熟悉的声音中，满心恐惧的队员们急匆匆地朝穿梭机的方向逃命。当众人接近穿梭机的时候，那句单调的、令人不安的“目前正在前往舰桥”，终于再也听不到了。
languages.original_text: Terror flooded the Lord Captain's mind, and the rest of the unit fell victim as well. Unable to master their fear, the team fled, pursued by the echo of that familiar voice. The hasty retreat only stopped when they approached the shuttle, where the unsettling, monotonous words, "Proceeding to the bridge," could no longer be heard.

traits.locale_text: 舰长大人的脑中充满了恐惧，其他人也成为了恐惧的猎物。在熟悉的声音中，满心恐惧的队员们急匆匆地朝穿梭机的方向逃命。当众人接近穿梭机的时候，那句单调的、令人不安的“目前正在前往舰桥”，终于再也听不到了。

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの心に恐怖が押し寄せて、残りの部隊も同様に犠牲となった。恐怖に負けたチームは、あの聞き覚えのある反響する声に追われて逃げ出した。大急ぎで撤退する足はシャトルに近づいたところで止まったが、そのときには「ブリッジへと進め」という不安になる単調な言葉はもう聞こえなかった。
languages.original_text: Terror flooded the Lord Captain's mind, and the rest of the unit fell victim as well. Unable to master their fear, the team fled, pursued by the echo of that familiar voice. The hasty retreat only stopped when they approached the shuttle, where the unsettling, monotonous words, "Proceeding to the bridge," could no longer be heard.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの心に恐怖が押し寄せて、残りの部隊も同様に犠牲となった。恐怖に負けたチームは、あの聞き覚えのある反響する声に追われて逃げ出した。大急ぎで撤退する足はシャトルに近づいたところで止まったが、そのときには「ブリッジへと進め」という不安になる単調な言葉はもう聞こえなかった。

languages.text: Terror überflutete den Geist des Lord Captain, und auch der Rest der Einheit fiel ihm zum Opfer. Das Team konnte seine Angst nicht mehr beherrschen und floh, verfolgt vom Echo jener vertrauten Stimme. Der hastige Rückzug endete erst, als sie das Shuttle erreichten und die beunruhigenden, monotonen Worte "Unterwegs zur Brücke" nicht mehr zu hören waren.
languages.original_text: Terror flooded the Lord Captain's mind, and the rest of the unit fell victim as well. Unable to master their fear, the team fled, pursued by the echo of that familiar voice. The hasty retreat only stopped when they approached the shuttle, where the unsettling, monotonous words, "Proceeding to the bridge," could no longer be heard.

traits.locale_text: Terror überflutete den Geist des Lord Captain, und auch der Rest der Einheit fiel ihm zum Opfer. Das Team konnte seine Angst nicht mehr beherrschen und floh, verfolgt vom Echo jener vertrauten Stimme. Der hastige Rückzug endete erst, als sie das Shuttle erreichten und die beunruhigenden, monotonen Worte "Unterwegs zur Brücke" nicht mehr zu hören waren.

languages.text: La terreur inonda l'esprit {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et s'empara du reste de l'unité tout aussi facilement. Incapables de surmonter leur peur, les éclaireurs prirent la fuite à toutes jambes, poursuivis par l'écho de cette voix familière. Ils n'interrompirent leur course folle qu'à proximité de la navette, quand Sohn cessa d'annoncer son arrivée à la passerelle d'une voix monotone et perturbante.
languages.original_text: Terror flooded the Lord Captain's mind, and the rest of the unit fell victim as well. Unable to master their fear, the team fled, pursued by the echo of that familiar voice. The hasty retreat only stopped when they approached the shuttle, where the unsettling, monotonous words, "Proceeding to the bridge," could no longer be heard.

traits.locale_text: La terreur inonda l'esprit {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et s'empara du reste de l'unité tout aussi facilement. Incapables de surmonter leur peur, les éclaireurs prirent la fuite à toutes jambes, poursuivis par l'écho de cette voix familière. Ils n'interrompirent leur course folle qu'à proximité de la navette, quand Sohn cessa d'annoncer son arrivée à la passerelle d'une voix monotone et perturbante.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın zihnine akın eden dehşet, birimin kalanını ele geçirmekte de gecikmedi. Korkusuna hükmedemeyen takım, çareyi kaçmakta buldu. Tanıdık bir ses ise peşlerini bırakmadı. Telaşlı geri çekilme çabası, mekiğe yaklaşmalarıyla son buldu. İnsanı ürperten, monoton "köprüye intikal ediyoruz" sözcükleri artık duyulmuyordu.
languages.original_text: Terror flooded the Lord Captain's mind, and the rest of the unit fell victim as well. Unable to master their fear, the team fled, pursued by the echo of that familiar voice. The hasty retreat only stopped when they approached the shuttle, where the unsettling, monotonous words, "Proceeding to the bridge," could no longer be heard.

traits.locale_text: Dehşet, Lord Kaptan'ın zihnine akın ederken birimin kalanını ele geçirmekte de gecikmedi. Korkusuna hükmedemeyen takım, çareyi kaçmakta buldu ancak tanıdık bir ses peşlerinden geldi. Telaşlı geri çekilme çabası, mekiğe yaklaşmalarıyla son buldu. İnsanı ürperten, monoton "köprüye intikal ediyoruz" sözcükleri artık duyulmuyordu.
